title: Sovereign AGI Module Custom Type Definition (v94.3)
description: Defines reusable, complex data structures (types) for AGI modules, allowing formal typing of interfaces and data contracts.

type_name.description: The canonical name of the type within the module.

module_origin.description: Optional: Explicitly tracks which module owns this definition.

type_schema.description: The JSON Schema definition for this custom type. May use $ref to other canonical types or basic types defined in Module Interface schemas.
